PERSONA:
This 45- to 54-year-old Hispanic woman, a US-born citizen of California, is the primary householder of a single-parent household with kids. She speaks Spanish at home but also speaks English well. With some college education but no degree, her career prospects may be limited, and she might face challenges in achieving economic stability.
